Articles.Content: Hmm the fairings don't work for me

"Dear Chaka, we can't get enough <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr> action. Do you have a new launch vehicle that could satisfy our craving?"

Chaka: "Yes."

**Introducing:**

**AMV-X**

![b1b17e3ebf.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/b1b17e3ebf.jpg)

> 
> 
> On 3/27/2017 at 9:54 PM, Tristonwilson12 said:
> 
> 
> Hmm the fairings don't work for me
> 

There is an issue with procedural fairings in 1.2.2. For this version, fairings supplied are fixed in place.

Basically, the Chaka adjusted sizes for procedural fairings are not adjustable in 1.2.2, however they work perfectly in static mode.

For adjustable procedural fairings for your other craft, it's best to download the fairings directly from the author, **however please do not ask them for updates, they will get to it as time allows.**

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/36371-12-procedural-fairings-320-november-8/&do=embed"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-29T02:35:30Z" title="03/29/2017 02:35  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 29, 2017</time> by YANFRET**

That's like rockets in real life, fixed size fairings, the payload design accounts for the fairing size of the launch vehicle that'll be used. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

**Enjoy!**

![db4e32ed94.jpg](https://i.imgsafe.org/db4e32ed94.jpg)

I cannot believe that I only now discovered this mod.  It's an amazingly complete package for near future interplanetary exploration, and beautifully done too.  After a few days, I've barely scratched the surface.  But so far the highlights for me are the Orion MPCVs, ALCOR pods, and the lander stages and now that Alexustis has updated his ASETs mod, it's a perfect marriage.

I have just two questions.

1. I had just updated ASETs prior to discovering your mod.  Everything was functioning correctly.  Once I loaded this mod, part of the ASETS mod was broken, specifically the digital readouts were displaying code.  I reloaded the earlier ASET version and everything was fine.  Is it possible that the latest ASET update is newer than the one you include with this mod?
2. The Orion MPCV holds three Kerbalnauts.  The real-life version holds 6, IIRC.  Is this intended?  Personally, I'm fine with it, especially if changing that means changing the IVA.

Anyway, it's a great mod.  It's like getting a whole new game.  Thanks!

Hi Yanfret, just wondering, could you add this to <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>?

Would be cool!

Anyways great mod!!!

Love the detail and the IVA of the pods especially!!!

Amazing, download Raster Prop Monitor and ASET, plus the new 1.2.2 Alcor pods, its great!!!

Love it Yanfret, and look forward your future amazing mods to be released!
